definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: be stained (NH Niph. id. (Jastr); [[כֶּתֶם]] blood-stain; Targum [[כְּתִים]] (blood-)stained Is 1:18; [[כִּיתְמָא]] blood-stain Je 2:22; Syr. kram stain, defile, Pt., also Pa. Ethpa., and derive.; Ar. katama is cover, conceal, so As. katâmu; Zinj. [[כתם]] (?) DHM:Sendsch. P. 37);—

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pt., fig., [[נִכְתָּם עֲוֹנֵךְ לְפָנַי]] Je 2:22 stained is thine iniquity before me (cf. Eng. phr. iniquity of deepest dye).
